nodes.text: The XR-32 hunter droid was a new model of battle droid model employed by the Sith Empire during the Battle of Corellia. They were deployed in the northwestern Blastfield Shipyards, and Captain Drizan—a member of the local Corellian resistance—convinced the Barsen'thor to destroy a number of them to thin the Imperial forces in the area and allow Selonian scouts to sneak into the area.
